name: Stationary Bike
how_to_perform:
1. Sit on the stationary bike with your back straight, feet flat on the pedals and hands holding onto the handlebars for support.
2. Start pedaling at a comfortable pace to begin warming up. Gradually increase the intensity of your cycling by adjusting the resistance level as needed.
3. Engage your core and maintain good posture throughout the exercise. Keep your weight evenly distributed in the seat, avoiding leaning forward or backward.
4. Pedal swiftly and efficiently, focusing on utilizing your legs and cardiovascular system to generate power.
5. Monitor your progress and adjust the intensity level as required to challenge yourself and optimize results.
short_summary: The stationary bike is a low-impact cardio machine that can be used for exercise in various settings, offering an engaging way to improve overall fitness by working the lower body and cardiovascular system.
